item.title: Former UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak to advise Microsoft and Anthropic
item.description: Former Conservative PM Rishi Sunak served from 2022 to 2024. Britain's Acoba flagged concerns of granting "unfair access" to Anthropic and Microsoft.

item.title: Investors are betting $21 billion that the energy transition isn’t going away
item.description: Political shifts might have set back the energy transition, but large investors are betting that renewables are at the future of energy.

item.title: UK slaps Google Search with special market status, making way for stricter regulations
item.description: The CMA has designated Google as having "strategic market status" in the search and search advertising markets, which means the company has such "a su...

item.title: The world is just not quite ready for humanoids yet
item.description: Famed robotics Rodney Brooks recently sounded the alarm on the amount of money going into humanoid startups. He's not the only skeptic.

item.title: Shutdown silver lining? Your IPO review comes after investors buy in
item.description: With 90% of SEC staff furloughed, the agency announced on Thursday that it won't penalize companies for omitting pricing details during the shutdown.
